name: tdn-cli
description: Task management CLI for humans and AI agents

scripts.check: bun run format:check && bun run lint && bunx tsc --noEmit && cargo clippy --manifest-path crates/core/Cargo.toml -- -D warnings && cargo test --manifest-path crates/core/Cargo.toml
scripts.check:ts: bun run format:check && bun run lint && bunx tsc --noEmit
scripts.check:rust: cargo clippy --manifest-path crates/core/Cargo.toml -- -D warnings && cargo test --manifest-path crates/core/Cargo.toml
scripts.fix: bun run format && bun run lint:fix && cargo fmt --manifest-path crates/core/Cargo.toml
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust
